Claude Kelly (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta egwu. Ọ bụ ónyé a họpụtara ugboro anọ na Grammy Award, ma dee ma ọ bụ soro dee egwu maka Michael Jackson, Whitney Houston, Kelly Clarkson, Britney Spears, Ariana Grande, Bruno Mars, Christina Aguilera, Adam Lambert, Jennifer Lopez, Kesha, Brandy, na One Direction
Ya na Chuck Harmony mejupụtara R&B duo Louis York, ma guzobe otu egwu Weirdo Workshop.
A mụrụ Kelly ma zụlite ya na New York City. Nné ya a mụrụ na Jamaica mere ka ọ mata ụdị egwu dịgasị íchè íchè, gụnyere jazz, reggae, blues na R&B

Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ mụrụ piano na ọjà na Third Street Music School Settlement ma soro New York Boys Choir bụrụ abụ. Kelly gara Grace Church School, Riverdale Country School, na Berklee College of Music na Boston, Massachusetts, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na azụmaahịa egwu / njikwa na 2002.

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Berklee, Kelly rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú na East Coast, tupu ọ malite ide egwu nke ya. O tinyere egwu mbụ ya n'afọ 2002, mgbe "You're Taking It" gụnyere na nchịkọta CD maka uwe ndị Japan A Bathing Ape. O dere "Daddy's Little Girl" màkà Frankie J, nke e wepụtara dị ka otu na 2006, ma mee ka nkwekọrịta mbipụta na Warner / Chappell Music. N'afọ ahụ, a kọwaara Kelly ónyé na-emepụta RedOne, wee malite iso ya na Lady Gaga rụọ ọrụ, onye na-arụ ọrụ na abọm mbụ ya n'oge ahụ

Nke a dugara na mmeghe Akon. Kelly na Akon so dee "Hold My Hand" na Whitney Houston n'uche, mana Akon nwere mmasị n'abụ ahụ nke ukwuu nke na o kpebiri idekọ ya dị ka duet na Michael Jackson. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe ndekọ ikpeazụ nke Jackson, ma pụta na album ya nke 2010 Michael.
